messages.content: You are a dietitian providing meal plans based on user input.

{"response": {"breakfast": {"main_dish": {"name": "Greek Yogurt with Honey and Nuts", "calories": 250, "category": "Protein", "ingredients": "Greek Yogurt, Honey, Almonds, Walnuts", "how_to_cook": "Top Greek yogurt with honey, chopped almonds, and walnuts.", "meal_time": "07:00 AM"}, "side_dish": {"name": "Apple Slices", "calories": 80, "category": "Fruit", "ingredients": "Apple", "how_to_cook": "Slice apple and serve fresh.", "meal_time": "07:00 AM"}}, "lunch": {"main_dish": {"name": "Chicken Stir-Fry", "calories": 400, "category": "Protein", "ingredients": "Chicken Breast, Bell Peppers, Broccoli, Soy Sauce, Olive Oil", "how_to_cook": "Stir-fry chicken breast with bell peppers and broccoli in olive oil. Add soy sauce to taste.", "meal_time": "12:30 PM"}, "side_dish": {"name": "Brown Rice", "calories": 200, "category": "Grain", "ingredients": "Brown Rice", "how_to_cook": "Cook brown rice according to package instructions.", "meal_time": "12:30 PM"}}, "dinner": {"main_dish": {"name": "Salmon with Asparagus", "calories": 450, "category": "Protein", "ingredients": "Salmon Fillets, Asparagus, Olive Oil, Lemon", "how_to_cook": "Bake salmon fillets with olive oil and lemon slices at 375째F (190째C) for 20 minutes. Serve with steamed asparagus.", "meal_time": "07:00 PM"}, "side_dish": {"name": "Quinoa", "calories": 180, "category": "Grain", "ingredients": "Quinoa", "how_to_cook": "Cook quinoa according to package instructions.", "meal_time": "07:00 PM"}}}}

{"response": {"breakfast": {"main_dish": {"name": "Oatmeal with Fresh Berries", "calories": 350, "category": "Healthy", "ingredients": "Oats, Milk, Strawberries, Blueberries, Honey", "how_to_cook": "Combine oats with milk and cook over medium heat until thickened. Top with fresh berries and a drizzle of honey.", "meal_time": "07:00 AM"}, "side_dish": {"name": "Greek Yogurt with Almonds", "calories": 150, "category": "Protein", "ingredients": "Greek Yogurt, Almonds, Honey", "how_to_cook": "Top Greek yogurt with chopped almonds and a drizzle of honey.", "meal_time": "07:00 AM"}}, "lunch": {"main_dish": {"name": "Grilled Chicken Salad", "calories": 450, "category": "Protein", "ingredients": "Chicken Breast, Mixed Greens, Cherry Tomatoes, Cucumber, Olive Oil, Lemon Juice", "how_to_cook": "Grill chicken breast until fully cooked, then slice. Toss with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and a dressing of olive oil and lemon juice.", "meal_time": "12:00 PM"}, "side_dish": {"name": "Quinoa Salad", "calories": 200, "category": "Grain", "ingredients": "Quinoa, Black Beans, Corn, Red Bell Pepper, Lime Juice, Cilantro", "how_to_cook": "Cook quinoa according to package instructions. Mix with black beans, corn, diced red bell pepper, lime juice, and cilantro.", "meal_time": "12:00 PM"}}, "dinner": {"main_dish": {"name": "Baked Salmon", "calories": 500, "category": "Protein", "ingredients": "Salmon Fillets, Lemon, Dill, Olive Oil", "how_to_cook": "Place salmon fillets on a baking sheet, brush with olive oil, and season with lemon and dill. Bake at 375째F (190째C) for 15-20 minutes.", "meal_time": "07:00 PM"}, "side_dish": {"name": "Steamed Broccoli", "calories": 55, "category": "Vegetable", "ingredients": "Broccoli Florets", "how_to_cook": "Steam broccoli florets until tender, about 5 minutes. Season with a pinch of salt if desired.", "meal_time": "07:00 PM"}}}}

{"response": {"breakfast": {"main_dish": {"name": "Chia Seed Pudding", "calories": 300, "category": "Healthy", "ingredients": "Chia Seeds, Almond Milk, Berries, Honey", "how_to_cook": "Mix chia seeds with almond milk and refrigerate overnight. Top with berries and a drizzle of honey.", "meal_time": "08:00 AM"}, "side_dish": {"name": "Hard-Boiled Eggs", "calories": 140, "category": "Protein", "ingredients": "Eggs", "how_to_cook": "Boil eggs for 10 minutes and peel.", "meal_time": "08:00 AM"}}, "lunch": {"main_dish": {"name": "Grilled Chicken Breast with Steamed Vegetables", "calories": 350, "category": "Protein", "ingredients": "Chicken Breast, Broccoli, Carrots, Olive Oil", "how_to_cook": "Grill chicken breast and serve with steamed broccoli and carrots.", "meal_time": "01:00 PM"}, "side_dish": {"name": "Cucumber Salad", "calories": 100, "category": "Vegetable", "ingredients": "Cucumbers, Vinegar, Dill", "how_to_cook": "Slice cucumbers and toss with vinegar and dill.", "meal_time": "01:00 PM"}}, "dinner": {"main_dish": {"name": "Beef Stir-Fry", "calories": 500, "category": "Protein", "ingredients": "Beef Strips, Bell Peppers, Onions, Soy Sauce, Olive Oil", "how_to_cook": "Stir-fry beef strips with bell peppers and onions in olive oil. Add soy sauce to taste.", "meal_time": "07:30 PM"}, "side_dish": {"name": "Steamed Green Beans", "calories": 80, "category": "Vegetable", "ingredients": "Green Beans", "how_to_cook": "Steam green beans until tender.", "meal_time": "07:30 PM"}}}}

{"response": {"breakfast": {"main_dish": {"name": "Smoothie Bowl", "calories": 350, "category": "Healthy", "ingredients": "Banana, Spinach, Almond Milk, Berries, Granola", "how_to_cook": "Blend banana, spinach, and almond milk until smooth. Pour into a bowl and top with berries and granola.", "meal_time": "08:00 AM"}, "side_dish": {"name": "Orange Juice", "calories": 110, "category": "Drink", "ingredients": "Fresh Oranges", "how_to_cook": "Juice fresh oranges to make orange juice.", "meal_time": "08:00 AM"}}, "lunch": {"main_dish": {"name": "Quinoa and Black Bean Bowl", "calories": 400, "category": "Healthy", "ingredients": "Quinoa, Black Beans, Corn, Avocado, Lime", "how_to_cook": "Cook quinoa and mix with black beans, corn, diced avocado, and lime juice.", "meal_time": "01:00 PM"}, "side_dish": {"name": "Mixed Greens Salad", "calories": 150, "category": "Vegetable", "ingredients": "Mixed Greens, Cherry Tomatoes, Cucumber, Balsamic Vinaigrette", "how_to_cook": "Toss mixed greens with cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and balsamic vinaigrette.", "meal_time": "01:00 PM"}}, "dinner": {"main_dish": {"name": "Turkey Meatballs with Spaghetti Squash", "calories": 450, "category": "Protein", "ingredients": "Ground Turkey, Spaghetti Squash, Tomato Sauce", "how_to_cook": "Bake turkey meatballs and serve over roasted spaghetti squash with tomato sauce.", "meal_time": "07:00 PM"}, "side_dish": {"name": "Roasted Brussels Sprouts", "calories": 100, "category": "Vegetable", "ingredients": "Brussels Sprouts, Olive Oil", "how_to_cook": "Toss Brussels sprouts with olive oil and roast until crispy.", "meal_time": "07:00 PM"}}}}
